Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: configure deployment for Digital Ocean

- Change Procfile from yarn to npm \(DO doesn''t have yarn by default\)
- Add Node.js engine requirement \(>=18.0.0\)
- Update .gitignore to protect all .env.* files

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(creator\): update GraphQL schema with activeBrandId field

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
